testcase.name: show new reaction form - Should return OK status
show new reaction form with invalid theme id - Should return BAD_REQUEST status
show new reaction form with null theme id - Should return BAD_REQUEST status
show new reaction form with invalid message id - Should return BAD_REQUEST status
show new reaction form with null message id - Should return BAD_REQUEST status
create new reaction - Should redirect to the /themes/theme/{themeId}/message/{mesId} route
create new reaction with invalid theme id - Should return BAD_REQUEST status
create new reaction with null theme id - Should return BAD_REQUEST status
create new reaction with invalid message id - Should return BAD_REQUEST status
create new reaction with null message id - Should return BAD_REQUEST status
create new reaction with invalid field - Should return BAD_REQUEST status
show delete reaction form - should return OK status
show delete reaction form with theme message id - should return BAD_REQUEST status
show delete reaction form with null theme id - should return BAD_REQUEST status
show delete reaction form with invalid message id - should return BAD_REQUEST status
show delete reaction form with null message id - should return BAD_REQUEST status
show delete reaction form with invalid reaction number - should return BAD_REQUEST status
delete reaction - Should redirect to the /themes/theme/{themeId}/message/{mesId} route
delete reaction with invalid theme id - should return BAD_REQUEST status
delete reaction with null theme id - should return BAD_REQUEST status
delete reaction with invalid message id - should return BAD_REQUEST status
delete reaction with null message id - should return BAD_REQUEST status
delete reaction with invalid reaction number - should return BAD_REQUEST status
delete reaction without check field - should return BAD_REQUEST status
